description:
Maintaining good control of your your diet is the key secret for good health.
    Enter your age, weight , height and  activeness and this app will calculate the calories need perday and  Fat, Protein, Carbohydrates, Alcohol.
    Use this app and plan for your diet for your body.
    Use this app and make your body very healthy.
    This app is ad free.
    This app works in offline. No need to connect the net.
